@notboysean @rudemrlang dare I ask which publication it is?
wonder how many people will stop me today & ask who should be the new Doctor? I love that we live in a world where people care!
@UniversalEvent I do agree re positive male role model but I think female WILL happen. If not this time, then soon.
@UniversalEvent why?
@Mooneye63 that may be your opinion but isn't it a bit rude to leave her copied in when you say that?
I'm all for a female Doctor. They didn't get one in the White House, so let's put one in the Blue House! #DoctorWho https://t.co/800OA66duq
You know who I'd love to see play The Doctor @katherine_kelly - I'm not sure if her role in @bbcclass makes that more or less likely...?
@Smurphy71 oh absolutely!
When the Brexit ref took place we saw the US as our trading partner. Now that relationship is in question, Article 50 must not be invoked.
@WhoSFX it was very, very hot on that evening
@WhoSFX I don't think he's being critical of you. Rather he (she?) is saying that you're not like the majority of Twitter right now.
@riverisland @reeceking_ "Tuesdays" doesn't have an apostrophe in it, whatever colour we wear.
@heathlenie well, surely it's not surprising that a TV presenter with no political experience isn't up to the job?
@Roofyj well I am now that you're here!
So this is what four weeks of not drinking and eating healthy has done for me. https://t.co/9yaiSSE9fU
@Roofyj you're back!
@rudemrlang yes, but with that face it was more appealing!

Sat on the train to London eating an omelette I made last night. Its smell is getting me dirty looks. Eggsellent!
@GaryWales @Trump_Regrets I was going to follow that but I think it'll actually annoy me more than anything!
Woke up in the middle of the night and saw this on my phone. United States you have elected a dangerous despot for… https://t.co/unZKh3ny1R
@nimbos really? Good. Not that it counts for much.
@blucanary I just emailed him and got the most lovely response. He is such a great guy. Will miss him loads.
@Alastair_JB wise words. Everyone says it, but few live by it. It's not always easy when the minutiae of life gets in the way.
I'm wondering how Trump supporters are taking his first few days in office. Obviously the crazies & racists love it but what about the rest?
Been listening to @depechemode Violater this morning for first time in years. Sounds so fresh. Partly due to its mix of guitar & synth.
@mrdiscopop @DirtyPopCardiff people's personal preferences aside, it's seen its audiences massively increase around the world, though.
@GavinWorby he's said that Xmas is his last.
Peter Capaldi on News at 10!
@Mooneye63 why do you assume it's anything to do with the schedule? Actors tend to do 3 or 4 series before moving on to other work.
So Easter sees the start of Peter Capaldi's last full series in Doctor Who. So sad, but we've still got almost a year of his amazing Doctor.
@Mooneye63 I'd love him to stay longer too. A shame.
@CreativeCatFX people who don't like it probably have no souls
@BriggsNicholas @ChristelDee we have spare hair! https://t.co/K4JKP32nHA
@CreativeCatFX it's amazing. I'm really shocked that some people just don't get it!
Someone's sent me something for approval and it's green. I absolutely HATE the colour green. https://t.co/Qie4dIx5AF
While the "mentioned in parliament within 12 months" ethos of online petitions is pointless, I have to admit this one has grabbed attention.
Given what I said about online petitions, in this instance I'm pleased to have been proved wrong.
@bjc4691 and your point? Am I not allowed to have or express an opinion?
@AnthemEditor (and I mean that most respectfully - your magazine is an excellent read).
@AnthemEditor hooray for your forthcoming Madonna special. But please have it fact checked. Your ABBA edition only got A-, for its errors.
@Nyssa1968 @FrankhamAllen @joelidster actually, I'll agree with you on that.
@04nbod I was being facetious. I thought that was clear but clearly not. Or not clear to you. Anyway, I'm too old to be conscripted!?
@VictorVortex I am encouraging people to take effective action. You know this but are being deliberately polemic. Swearing is trolling.
@04nbod I don't get your point. I'm not against people taking action. My point is that online petitions are wasted effort, do something else
@VictorVortex then write a letter. Donate to an organisation that opposes. Anything but sign a useless petition.
@VictorVortex and I don't know who you are. We've never met. So, yes, I am entitled to be offended that you are trolling me.
@VictorVortex I want people to do want they can. I'm advising that a certain act is not as effective as another. So do something that works.
@jonnymorris1973 mine will probably have a typo, but it's the thought that cunts.
@joelidster @FrankhamAllen than that, we are raising a generation of people who think you can solve the worlds problems from a keyboard 2/2
@joelidster @FrankhamAllen look, sign the petitions if you want. I've given it a lot of thought and consider them a placebo. But more 1/2
@jonnymorris1973 don't you think standing outside Buckingham Palace with placards is a better idea, though.
@VictorVortex I'm sorry, but is there any need for you to speak to me in that way? You're free to argue but drop the bad language.
@joelidster @FrankhamAllen it'll get tabled for a mention by a junior minister within 12 months - wow!
@jonnymorris1973 in this ever-growing world of keyboard warriors, people need to direct their fear and anger more effectively
@joelidster @FrankhamAllen Trump reacted to last weekend's march. It will have bothered him. And it made people feel united.
@runawaygirlx it's not far away!
@FrankhamAllen I was being facetious. The point is signing a petition is the laziest effort. Get out and march.
@Pystrier so what? Last weekend's march was more effective.
@NebogipfelWho it's a waste of time. It will have more effect to do well organised protests like the women's march.
@runawaygirlx it's a placebo. You have a voice, you have legs. Use them
@VictorVortex oh really? I didn't realise that https://t.co/0ErDmYdqlL
@jonnymorris1973 It's a placebo.
Going to this tomorrow. https://t.co/zc42QlK2rp
Did an online petition win WW2? No. Did an online petition get women the vote? No. So it's not going to get rid of Trump
@matt_lissack oh really?
Oh yawn, another online petition. What's wrong with people? THEY HAVE NO EFFECT. Join a march or something.
On a plus, I really liked the Izzy Bizu song whereas I've been a bit "meh" about her in the past.
Have always loved Ewan but didn't think he came across well on @TheGNShow - especially that first class air travel story that went nowhere.

At least our Eurovision song sounds credible, @luciejones1 can really sing and it's not embarrassing. Production needs a kick of paint, tho.
@nerdygoldy yes. Have you heard any? He was great in them
@RevBobMIB yes - it say his name over the final frame "introducing John Hurt as The Doctor", doesn't it?
@RevBobMIB I'm referring to his appearance - albeit brief - at the end of Name of the Doctor. McGann only in one episode plus web only Ep
I remember us all at Buckingham Palace in Nov 2013 & John Hurt asking Moffat if he was OK to say he was an official Doctor - hell yes, John!
@RevBobMIB I've not added up the minutes. Possibly. But he did appear in two episodes.
I appreciate that, in the grand scheme of things, it's the least of our worries, but WTF has Theresa May done to her hair?
John Hurt was an incredibly nice man & a wonderful actor. He always seemed in awe that he managed to be The Doctor & we were lucky. RIP
@fraxis well then they had the Vamps to redress the balance
I'm pleased that Lucie is being put forward for us #EurovisionYouDecide https://t.co/aCdy5qjsxo
@blucanary plus she was on SJA
@blucanary it was quite audible on TV.
Stick a 909 under this song and it would fly #EurovisionYouDecide
Members of that audience booing Lucy should be ashamed of themselves #EurovisionYouDecide
Thank Christ it's Lucy going forward. She's the only one that can sing live and that sang has substance and conviction #EurovisionYouDecide
I love the way Swedes pronounce "you" as "Jew" ❤️❤️❤️
Mel: "Fuck it. Shall we just get Sophie Ellis-Bextor to do it instead?" #eurovisionyoudecide
Love Love Peace Peace is the best moment in Eurovision history aside from Waterloo #eurovisionyoudecide
If you asked everyone in that audience if they wanted @SophieEB to represent us instead of that lot it would be a 100% "yes" vote.
Bless you, Mel. No one under the age of 30 has ever heard of talc #EurovisionYouDecide
One of the Vamps really can't sing!
Love The Common Linnets. Both so beautiful #EurovisionYouDecide
